name: Ultimate Row Gradient Light
author: dedalx

sections.description:
Add beautyful static or animated 2-4 colors gradients to any Row in WPBakery Page Builder with any elements. WPBakery Page Builder plugin (original version) required for plugin.

Automatic plugin integration with ANY theme allow you to just install this plugin and start adding gradients, no coding knowledge required.

This is a Free light version of Ultimate Row Gradient Background plugin and include this features:

  • Plugin works with ANY WordPress theme
  • Fastest row gradient plugin
  • No configuration required
  • Unlimited colors and styles combinations
  • 1 gradient type
  • Work with ANY row in WPBakery Page Builder
  • Work with ANY items inside row
  • Crossbrowser compatibility (work smooth in any modern browser)
  • WP Multisite and Multiuser (WPMU / WPMS / WordPress MU) compatible
  • Detailed Documentation guide included
  • Minimalist, lightweight, and efficient fast code
  • Work on mobile/touch devices
  • Retina support
  • 100% Responsive all plugin elements and pages
  • Translation ready (POT file included)

Purchase PRO version to get more amazing features:

  • 2-4 colors complex smooth gradients
  • Animated gradients
  • Horizontal, Vertical, Diagonal gradient types
  • Free Plugin updates and dedicated support

Live Demo

Ultimate Row Gradient Background plugin Live Demo: Live Preview

Pro Version
